alert.note: Alert for Goochland; Hanover (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 27 at 7:59PM EDT until May 27 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR LOUISA...NORTHWESTERN GOOCHLAND AND NORTHWESTERN HANOVER COUNTIES... At 756 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Louisa to near Mineral to near Fife, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Mineral around 800 PM EDT. Gum Spring around 810 PM EDT. Bumpass around 815 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Orchid, Pendleton, Louisa Airport, Green Springs, Mabelton, Cuckoo, Caledonia, Yanceyville, Fredericks Hall and Byrd Mill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
